summary: A combined module that detects keypoints with KeyNet, refines their affine shape using AffNet, and generates HardNet descriptors, providing an end‑to‑end local feature extraction pipeline.
business_intent: Allow developers to obtain robust, affine‑invariant visual features for image matching, visual localization, 3D reconstruction, SLAM and related computer‑vision applications without manually integrating separate detectors and descriptors.
